name: Tide and Time Wait for No One
name_original: Tide and Time Wait for No One
description:
Original Scratch Page (play here):

Tide and Time Wait for No One

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~INSTRUCTIONS~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You are the Grand Emperor of a (currently empty) sand kingdom. Your objective is to protect it against the waves! Amass Sand Dollars to upgrade your Income and Defense from cards in your hand. Each turn represents two hours, so after 6 turns, high tide sweeps in and devastates your kingdom if defenses were not prepared. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~OTHER INFO~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Made for both the Scratch Community Game Jam 2023 and the ScratchTools Game Jam 2023.
